attributes.action: Reform Child Maintenance Service to reflect real care, actual costs and fairness
attributes.additional_details: The CMS system is outdated and unfair. It ignores daytime care, travel costs, and additional needs, focusing only on income and overnight stays. This punishes involved parents and creates huge disparities between similar families. Reform is needed so payments reflect real care, shared responsibility, and the true cost of raising children, ensuring fairness and stability for both households.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Require child maintenance payments to increase by inflation & review enforcement" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741254
